textAfterTable: Swedish[edit] Etymology[edit] From Old Norse Pétr, from Latin Petrus, from Ancient Greek Πέτρος (Pétros), from πέτρος (pétros, “stone, rock”), related to πέτρα (pétra). Later reinforced by the German Peter. Proper noun[edit] Peter A male given name.
